articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Light Comedy "Echo of Mountain"
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed light comedy "Echo of Mountain" newly created by the State Theatrical Troupe.
					 The light comedy deals with the devoted efforts and worthwhile life of agricultural workers in a mountainous area who turned out in the drive to increase the grain production and build their socialist rural village into a beautiful land of bliss, true to the WPK's agricultural policy. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave the theatrical troupe an instruction to recreate the light comedy and widely stage it as it was personally watched and highly appreciated by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The creators and artistes of the theatrical troupe have waged a dynamic campaign to recreate it, achieving such a signal success as newly creating it as an excellent light comedy as required by the new century in a matter of four months.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the creators and artistes of the troupe produced a splendid light comedy perfect in ideological contents and artistry meeting the aesthetic taste in the era of Songun by preserving the Juche-oriented theory on drama attained in bringing about a radical turn in producing dramas and thoroughly applying it to their creation. He highly appreciated the successful performance and extended thanks to them.
					
					 Saying that the light comedy is another monumental masterpiece representing the literature and arts in the era of Songun as it has reached the best level in its ideological contents and in all the elements of depiction, he saw to it that Kim Il Sung Prize was awarded to this work as it serves as a good textbook for the ideological education of the servicepersons and the people of the DPRK and showed great loving care for the creators and artistes.
					
					 The theatrical troupe, which has carried forward and glorified the precious legacy of the five revolutionary dramas and the work style displayed in creating them, has powerfully demonstrated once again its ability as a prestigious art troupe in the course of creating the above-said light comedy, he noted, adding that this is a striking demonstration of the great potential of the drama creating staff firmly armed with the WPK's Juche-oriented literary and art idea and theory. 
					
					  Noting that revolutionary dramas in the DPRK serve as effective ideological weapons for training all the members of the society as Juche-type revolutionaries and transforming it as required by the Juche idea for their rich ideological contents and high artistry in line with the need and desire in the new era, he underscored the need to conduct dynamic performing activities to let more people watch them. 
					
					 The theatrical troupe is faced with a heavy and yet honorable task to consolidate the successes and experience gained in making a great turn in producing dramas and create more revolutionary dramas rich in ideological contents and high in artistry on this basis and thus make a contribution to carrying out the cause of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea, he said, setting forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for the troupe in the art creation and performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs, Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, and officials in the fields of literature and arts and media.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Yong Chol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Yong Chol
						
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath before the bier of Ri Yong Chol, member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, member of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, deputy to the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and first vice-director of a department of the Party Central Committee, expressing deep condolences over his death on Monday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets South African President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets South African President 
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Jacob Gedleyihlekisa Zuma, President of South Africa, on April 23 on the occasion of its "Day of Freedom".
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would continue to develop, Kim in the message wished the President and people of South Africa success in their efforts for stability and economic progress of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Togolese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Togolese President
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, President of Togo, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its independence.
					 In the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples, Kim in the message wished the President and people of Togo success in the work for the national unity and economic reconstruction.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Sierra Leonean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Sierra Leonean President
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Ernest Bai Koroma, President of Sierra Leone, on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of its independence.
					 In the belief that the friendly and cooperative ties between the two countries would develop on good terms in the interests of the two peoples, Kim in the message wished the President of Sierra Leone success in his work for the peace and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Credentials of Philippine Ambassador Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Philippine Ambassador Accepted
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Francisco L. Benedicto, Philippine ambassador to the DPRK, presented his credentials to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Margaret Chan, director-general of the World Health Organization, and her party, Massimo Barra, chairman of the Standing Commission of the Red Cross and Red Crescent, and his party, a Ugandan government delegation led by Geraldine Namirembe Bitamazire, minister of Education and Sports, and the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia led by Head and Chief Conductor Pavel Borisovich Ovsyannikov arrived here on Monday.
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK government gave receptions in honor of the director-general of the WHO and her party and the Ugandan government delegation on the same day.

articles.title: Concert Enjoyed by Officials and People
articles.content:
Concert Enjoyed by Officials and People
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Senior party, army and state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of the party, armed forces, working organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and working people in Pyongyang enjoyed the concert to celebrate the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army given by the State Merited Chorus on Monday.
					 Present there on invitation were artistes of the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					 The concert began with the playing of the "Patriotic Song." Put on the stage were various numbers including male chorus "Song of the Korean People's Army," male solo and chorus "A Sentinel Offers Warm Greetings to the Leader", male chorus "Wind Blows on Mt. Paektu" and male solo and chorus "Song of Comradeship."
					
					The performers enthusiastically sang high praises of the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung who provided the glorious and ever-victorious history and traditions of the Korean revolution and those of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who demonstrated the country's dignity and might with his original Songun politics.
					
					 The numbers including male solo and chorus "Soldiers Live near the General," male chorus "The Way to Victory," tale and mixed choruses "The Road of Our March" and "The Victorious Parade" truthfully represented the powerful spirit and militant mettle of the KPA which has opened up a new era of prosperity under the leadership of the peerlessly great man born of Heaven.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Festival Opened
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Festival Opened
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The 25th central festival of science and technology was opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition on Monday.
					 Presented to the festival to be held divided into 21 sections were more than 670 pieces of scientific research achievements and technical innovation proposals made in various fields of the national economy.
					
					 Present there were Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Thae Bok, Vice-Premier of the Cabinet O Su Yong, Minister of Education Kim Yong Jin, President of the State Academy of Sciences Jang Chol, officials concerned and scientists, technicians and working people who were highly appreciated at the local festivals of science and technology.
					
					 Ri Ja Bang, chairman of the State Scientific and Technological Commission and chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea, made an opening address.

articles.title: Campaign for Inventions, New Technologies Brisk
articles.content:
Campaign for Inventions, New Technologies Brisk
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Efforts have been made to introduce inventions and new technologies in economic sectors of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Since a national meeting of inventors was held in Juche 77 (1988), such events as national exhibition of inventions and new technologies, national exhibition of achievements of young scientists and technicians, and scientific and technological festival and seminar have been organized on a regular way, involving not only scientific research institutes but scientists, technicians and many other working people from educational and health institutions and industrial establishments.
					
					 Over the past two decades the number of applications for patent right has steadily increased.
					
					  Many of them have helped solve crucial issues arising in production.
					
					 The fact shows that interchange and cooperation have been strengthened as regards intellectual property rights and that a big progress made in examination, registration, protection and dissemination of inventions and patent things. It also indicates that public interest in new inventions and technologies is ever growing in the country. 
					
					Colorful activities taking place in the DPRK to mark the World Intellectual Property Day (April 26), this year's theme of which is "Innovation-Linking the World", will serve as an occasion in promoting the technical innovation movement in the country.

articles.title: Mt. Paektu Area Proved More Abundant in Natural Resources
articles.content:
Mt. Paektu Area Proved More Abundant in Natural Resources
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University have newly discovered more than 30 landscapes and some 2,000 species of animals and plants in the Mt. Paektu area.
					 Typical landscapes are Betula ermani, Picea jezoensis, bush, Abies nesphrolepis, Larix olgensis var. koreana areas and fantastic rock and grassland areas.
					
					Groups of some 10 species of trees, including Alnus maximowiczii and Salix graciliistyla, were found out in the Paektusan secret camp where the birthplace of General Secretary Kim Jong Il is.
					
					 Also confirmed around Mts. Sobaek, Kanbaek, Kom and Sono and Saja Peak around Jong Il Peak in the secret camp are nearly 600 species of rare animals and plants such as Geophilus lineatus, Pinus koraiensis and Malus baccata.
					
					The new discovery shows that 1,857 species of vascular plants and more than 5,000 species of animals exist in the Mt. Paektu area.

articles.title: US Flailed for Charging DPRK with Nuclear Proliferation
articles.content:
US Flailed for Charging DPRK with Nuclear Proliferation
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- U.S. President Obama blustered that north Korea is the biggest concern as far as worldwide nuclear proliferation is concerned. The U.S. secretary of State, when interviewed by a TV broadcasting service, listed the DPRK as a dangerous state posing a potential nuclear threat, while talking sheer nonsense that north Korea could try whatever it possibly could as it already had access to nukes. The U.S. assistant secretary of Defense for Policy at a hearing held at the Senate Armed Services Committee grumbled that there is an increasing danger of north Korea's possible attack on the U.S. mainland with long-range missiles.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is foolhardy and preposterous for the U.S. to run the whole gamut of wordplays in a bid to charge the DPRK with "nuclear proliferation".
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that the DPRK has never posed any nuclear threat to other countries but, has been exposed to the U.S. constant nuclear threat for a long time.
					
					 If the U.S. has a true willingness to avert a nuclear war and ensure peace, it should substantially cut down its nuclear weapons, without letting loose rhetoric, and refrain from any act of sparking off a fresh arms race, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. hypocritical talk about "reduction of nuclear weapons" is just a version of the theory of bolstering up modern nuclear hardware, the theory of nuclear threat.
					
					 It is the ulterior aim of the U.S. to threaten the whole world with nuclear and non-nuclear weapons and mount a preemptive attack on any target any moment. Herein lies the reactionary and dangerous nature of the U.S. frantic moves for bolstering up strategic offensive weapons including modern nuclear weapons behind the scene of "nuclear disarmament".
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to bolster up its war deterrent now that the U.S. is getting hell-bent on developing and bolstering up modern strategic offensive weapons under the pretext of non-existent "nuclear threat" from the DPRK and no one can find fault with it.

articles.title: Anniversary of April 19 Uprising Observed in Switzerland
articles.content:
Anniversary of April 19 Uprising Observed in Switzerland
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on April 18 to mark the 50th anniversary of the April 19 Popular Uprising by the south Korean people.
					 The uprising, staged in south Korea on April 19, 1960, was a popular resistance against the U.S. imperialists and their stooges' colonial fascist rule over south Korea, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 At that time, reverence for President Kim Il Sung and longing for the northern half of Korea, independent and socialist, were growing deeper and stronger among the south Korean people.
					
					 The south Korean people supported the line of independent and peaceful reunification advanced by the President and longed for withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea and for a new independent and democratic society.
					
					 Their pent-up wrath erupted as a massive resistance with the "March 15 fraudulent elections" as an occasion and, after all, the puppet Syngman Rhee clique could not but step down from "power" on April 26, 1960.
					
					 Though the pro-American Syngman Rhee puppet regime was overthrown, the U.S. imperialists' colonial domination and their stooges' fascist rule have lasted so far, the statement pointed out, adding: However, the fighting spirit of the south Korean people remains unchanged and the day will surely come when they emerge victorious.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in Brazil and Britain
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in Brazil and Britain
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party made public a statement on April 15, the Day of the Sun.
					 Noting that the Day of the Sun is significantly commemorated in Brazil, too, the statement said that the Korean people are foiling the constant war moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers one by one under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It stressed that the members of the Brazilian Communist Party wish the heroic Korean people great successes in their struggle to defend the national sovereignty and advance socialism to victory.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, too, issued a joint statement on April 14.
					
					 The statement praised President Kim Il Sung as the legendary hero, gifted strategist, invincible and iron-willed commander, great thinker-theoretician and prominent leader of the international labor movement.
					
					 It called upon the Juche idea followers to make deeper study of the President's career and revolutionary activities.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Britain
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Britain 
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a bulletin on April 15 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 Noting that it has been 18 years since President Kim Il Sung received the title of generalissimo of the DPRK, the bulletin in an article said:
					
					In the protracted and arduous struggle of guiding the cause of Juche-based army building,
						 Kim Il Sung founded the great military idea and the original strategies and tactics and performed the undying feats and gained ample experience, thus inspiringly encouraging the peoples in the struggle for independence against imperialism.
					
					 The Korean people had long wished to confer the highest title on him as a token of respect for the immortal exploits he performed on behalf of the country and the revolution.
					
					 This ardent wish was met on April 13, Juche 81(1992) when the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK National Defence Commission and the DPRK Central People's Committee decided to award the title of generalissimo of the DPRK to him.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed
Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia exhibition and a book, photo and handicraft exhibition took place in China and meetings and photo exhibitions in Romania, Bulgaria and Denmark between April 8 and 14 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 On display in their venues were books and photos introducing the revolutionary career and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and potted immortal Kimjongilias and Korean craftworks.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 Noting that Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea, and performed undying feats for the Korean revolution and global independence, the chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union said that the President is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world's progressives.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union said that Kim Il Sung defeated two imperialisms in one generation and turned the DPRK into the best socialist state centered on the popular masses. And he noted that the KPA has grown to be a matchlessly strong army protecting the gains of the revolution and reliably defending the security of the country and the people under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Danish preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung stressed that the President is the greatest man who is deeply revered as the most prominent statesman in the 20th century by not only the Korean people but the world progressives for his undying feats.
					
					 Meanwhile, meetings, round-table talks, lectures, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Russia, Sweden, Guinea, Iran and Peru between April 6 and 12 to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Letters and messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in Bulgaria, Denmark and Peru.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- One April day in Juche 65 (1976) President Kim Il Sung visited the Onpho Co-op Farm in Kyongsong County, North Hamgyong Province.
					 He was briefed on farming preparations by its officials and acquainted himself with the cultivation of cold-bed rice seedlings. When he saw a ditch, he told an official to measure the temperature of the water.
					
					 Finding it was 3-4 degrees lower than the atmospheric temperature, he said it was very important to warm water for rice field, especially in cold or infertile areas and that rice would grow better, if the temperature of water was raised 4 degrees more.
					
					 He then advised the farm officials to use the waste water from a hot spring of the nearby rest centre for its farming and took necessary measures for it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a los militares por el dia de fundacion del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a los militares por el dia de fundacion del EPC 
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la comandancia de la Unidad 586 del EPC y felicito a los oficiales y soldados del EPC en ocasion del 78o aniversario de su fundacion.
					  El Dirigente respondio cordialmente a los militares que le dan aclamaciones entusiastas y les felicito calurosamente a ellos que celebran el dia de fundacion del ejercito.
					
					  Tras recibir el saludo de recibimiento, vio los registros de triunfos que muestran la orgullosa trayectoria de la unidad llena de proezas.
					
					  Evaluo altamente las proezas de la unidad diciendo que esta es la unidad historica que desde los dias de la enconada guerra hasta la fecha realizo las orgullosas proezas en la defensa de la patria y la construccion socialista desplegando la abnegacion patriotica simpar y el heroismo masivo por el partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					  Al enterarse detalladamente de las hazanas de los numerosos heroes oriundos de esta unidad senalo que estos, que dedicaron sin vacilacion su juventud y vida por la patria y el pueblo, fueron los firmes revolucionarios y la verdadera raiz de nuestro partido y destaco que todos los militares deben aprender activamente del noble espiritu revolucionario de los antecedentes y hacerse los heroes del nuevo siglo a quienes recuerdan la patria y el pueblo.
					
					  Despues de recorrer los materiales y equipos tecnicos de combate entro en la sala de mando operacional y las salas de estudio militar de la unidad donde se entero del estado de entrenamiento y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en fortalecer por todos los medios la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					  A continuacion, visito la casa de militares y otros establecimientos de cultura y educacion cerciorandose de los detalles de la labor politica sobre los militares.
					
					  Se mostro alegre de que la unidad realiza de manera original y profunda la labor politica tras acondicionar bien los establecimientos de educacion ideologica y cultural conforme al caracter de los militares y todos los militares disfrutan suficientemente de la vida cultural  e hizo enfasis en la necesidad de prestar siempre primordial atencion a la labor ideologica.
					
					  El Dirigente se fotografio junto a los militares de la unidad.
					
					  El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia el concierto por el dia de fundacion del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia el concierto por el dia de fundacion del EPC
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el concierto del Coro Estatal Benemerito dedicado al aniversario 78o de la fundacion del heroico EPC.
					En la escena de la funcion iniciada con la interpretacion del Himno Nacional se pusieron el coro masculino "Marcha del Ejercito Popular de Corea", el solo y coro masculinos "Soldado rinde caluroso saludo al Lider", el coro masculino "Sopla el viento del monte Paektu", el solo y coro masculinos "Cancion de la camaraderia", el solo femenino y coro masculino "Nadie lo sabe", el solo y coro masculinos "Vino el fotografo a nuestra compania" y otras piezas.
					
					A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la orgullosa trayectoria del heroico EPC que ha recorrido el camino de la victoria y gloria con la bandera roja de la revolucion en alto y demostraron energicamente la ferrea conviccion y la indoblegable voluntad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo dispuestos a llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, iniciada en la selva del Paektu y la otra de construccion de gran potencia prospera.
					
					El Comandante Supremo se mostro muy satisfecho de que el Coro Estatal Benemerito haya ofrecido una excelente funcion en que predomina el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, evaluo altamente el exito de la funcion y dio agradecimiento a todos los creadores y artistas.
					
					Y expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que los artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito, bien conscientes de su honrosa mision y deber de trompeteros de la epoca del Songun, desarrollaran energicamente actividades artisticas revolucionarias y llamaran con mas vigor a nuestro ejercito y pueblo a la marcha general de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Le acompanaron en verlo el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el general de ejercito del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el general de ejercito del EPC Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el miembro del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo Ju Sang Song y otros miembros directivos del ejercito y organos de las fuerzas armadas, los secretarios del Comite Central del PTC Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il y Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.
					
					Ademas, estuvieron presentes alli los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y los soldados del EPC y los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion.

articles.title: Acreditase ante Kim Yong Nam nuevo embajador filipino
articles.content:
Acreditase ante Kim Yong Nam nuevo embajador filipino
						
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ATCC) -- Francisco L. Benedicto presento el dia 26 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Filipinas en Corea.
					  Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el representante diplomatico.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela designio de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela designio de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ATCC) -- El presidente norteamericano Obama dijo que "la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es el pais mas peligroso" en el problema de proliferacion nuclear en escala mundial. 
					  En su entrevista con una television, la secretaria de Estado de EE.UU. hablo de que "es imprevisible la RPDC que ya dispuso de las armas nucleares" y califico Corea del "pais peligroso" que puede "crear la amenaza nuclear".
					
					  Por otra parte, en una audiencia sostenida en la comision militar del senado el asistente del secretario de Defensa norteamericano por el asunto politico dijo que "sigue aumentando la amenaza de misil de largo alcance de la RPDC contra el territorio norteamericano".
					
					  EE.UU. se vale de todos los medios para calificar la RPDC del "criminal nuclear", pero, eso es un acto insensato y ridiculo.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 26 y continua:
					
					  La RPDC no ha dado ninguna amenaza nuclear a otros paises, sino ha vivido durante largo tiempo bajo la obstinada amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					  Si el imperio tiene de veras la voluntad de prevenir la guerra nuclear y preservar la paz, debe reducir realmente sus fuerzas armadas nucleares y abstenerse de los actos que causan nueva carrera armamentista.
					
					  La "reduccion de las armas nucleares", de que habla tanto ese imperio, deviene la teoria del aumento de las modernas fuerzas armadas nucleares y de la amenaza nuclear.
					
					  La verdadera intencion de EE.UU. es amenazar con las armas nucleares y otras a todo el mundo y asestar el golpe preventivo a cualquier objeto en cualquier momento.
					
					  He aqui el caracter reaccionario y la peligrosidad de las maniobras de aumento de las armas ofensivas estrategicas incluyendo los modernos artefactos nucleares que EE.UU. impulsa desesperadamente detras de la cortina de la "reduccion nuclear".
					
					  Ese pais americano da mas acicate al desarrollo y aumento de las modernas armas ofensivas estrategicas so pretexto de la supuesta "amenaza nuclear" de la RPDC.
					
					  En tal condicion, la RPDC redobla su disuasivo de guerra para hacer frente al respecto, lo cual es una cosa extremamente natural. Por lo tanto, nadie puede  censurarlo.
